title: 2018 UEC European Track Championships (under-23 & junior)
text: The 2018 <a href="UEC%20European%20Track%20Championships%20%28under-23%20%26amp%3B%20junior%29">UEC European Track Championships (under-23 & junior)</a> is the 18th continental championships for European under-23 and junior <a href="track%20cycling">track cyclists</a>, and the 9th since the event was renamed following the reorganisation of European track cycling in 2010. The event took place at the <a href="World%20Cycling%20Centre">World Cycling Centre</a> in <a href="Aigle">Aigle</a>, <a href="Switzerland">Switzerland</a> from 21 to 26 August 2018.
